statements: SELECT * FROM SocialMediaMetrics WHERE post_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT post_date, likes FROM SocialMediaMetrics WHERE shares > 100 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, shares, comments FROM SocialMediaMetrics WHERE likes >= 50 AND shares < 200;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaMetrics WHERE comments IS NOT NULL ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT post_date, SUM(likes), MAX(shares) FROM SocialMediaMetrics GROUP BY post_date;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaMetrics WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, likes FROM SocialMediaMetrics WHERE shares > 50 ORDER BY likes DESC, post_date ASC;
SELECT post_id, likes, shares, comments FROM SocialMediaMetrics WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY post_date;
SELECT post_id, likes, shares, comments FROM SocialMediaMetrics WHERE comments < 20 ORDER BY shares DESC, post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, SUM(likes) AS total_likes, SUM(shares) AS total_shares FROM SocialMediaMetrics GROUP BY post_id HAVING total_likes > 200;
SELECT * FROM BrandMetrics ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT brand_id, likes FROM BrandMetrics WHERE followers > 1000;
SELECT brand_id, impressions, engagement_rate FROM PostMetrics WHERE post_date >= '2021-06-01' AND post_date < '2021-07-01';
SELECT brand_id, likes, comments FROM BrandMetrics WHERE brand_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT brand_id, likes, comments FROM BrandMetrics WHERE likes > comments;
SELECT brand_id, followers, likes, comments FROM BrandMetrics WHERE brand_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PostMetrics WHERE brand_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT brand_id, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM PostMetrics GROUP BY brand_id HAVING SUM(impressions) > 5000;
SELECT brand_id, AVG(engagement_rate) AS avg_engagement_rate FROM PostMetrics GROUP BY brand_id;
SELECT brand_id, likes FROM BrandMetrics ORDER BY likes DESC, followers ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, followers FROM social_media_accounts WHERE followers > 1000;
SELECT post_content, likes FROM posts WHERE likes > 500 ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT username, engagement_rate FROM social_media_accounts WHERE engagement_rate > 3.5;
SELECT post_id, user_id, interaction_date FROM engagements WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts WHERE followers > 1000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT post_id, account_id, likes, comments FROM posts WHERE account_id = 1 ORDER BY post_id ASC, likes DESC;
SELECT engagement_id, post_id, user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM engagements WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY engagement_id DESC;
SELECT username, followers, engagement_rate FROM social_media_accounts WHERE followers < 5000 AND engagement_rate > 0.05;
SELECT post_content, likes, comments FROM posts WHERE likes > comments ORDER BY likes/comments DESC, post_content ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_platform
SELECT platform_name, followers_count FROM social_media_platform
SELECT platform_name, engagement_rate FROM social_media_platform WHERE followers_count > 10000
SELECT * FROM post_metrics ORDER BY post_date DESC
SELECT post_id, likes_count, shares_count FROM post_metrics WHERE likes_count > shares_count
SELECT * FROM social_media_platform WHERE platform_id = 1;
SELECT platform_name, followers_count FROM social_media_platform WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT * FROM post_metrics WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01' AND post_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM campaign_metrics WHERE reach_count >= 5000 AND conversion_rate > 0.1;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM influencer_metrics WHERE engagement_rate > 0.05;
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts;
SELECT account_name, followers_count, posts_count FROM social_media_accounts WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT brand_name, brand_category, total_engagement FROM brand_performance ORDER BY total_engagement DESC;
SELECT post_content, likes_count, comments_count FROM social_media_posts WHERE likes_count > 500 ORDER BY comments_count ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts ORDER BY followers_count DESC, posts_count ASC
SELECT account_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM social_media_accounts WHERE followers_count > 10000
SELECT brand_name, total_engagement, average_engagement FROM brand_performance WHERE total_engagement > 5000 ORDER BY average_engagement DESC
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts WHERE likes_count > 1000 AND comments_count > 500 ORDER BY shares_count DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE brand_id = 1
